page.description: The {FRAME} command draws a box around one or more cells of the Xdialog grid.

argument.name: Columns
argument.description: Numeric. The number of columns for the frame to surround.

argument.name: Rows
argument.description: Numeric. The number of rows for the frame to surround.

argument.name: Text
argument.description: Character. Optional. The title of the frame.

section.title: Example
section.description: For example, the following script places a frame around the address fields, which are two columns wide and seven rows deep. Note, how the pipe "|" character creates the second column in each line. [Picture]
